name: Roll Arena 64
description:
Roll Arena 64 is a strategy arena battler where you must take advantage of the sides on your dice to gain the most tiles over your opponents. The game takes heavy inspiration from titles such as Splatoon and Tron. 

To play the game, press one of the icons that appear next to your dice. These icons conquer different patterns of tiles. 

Dot - conquers the tile that the player lands on.

Double sided arrows - conquers either a column or row of tiles.

Crosshair - conquers two tiles in each direction from the tile that the player lands on.
